column3: str
Xeerol Ja is eager to hear back from Halnaruk.

Xeerol Ja has tasked you with creating Ja Tiika juice.

※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 230. Delivering items with a rating of 470 or more will earn greater rewards.
You deliver the Ja Tiika juice to Xeerol Ja. Speak with her again to learn about the next prototype your team will tackle.
Deliver Ja Tiika juice to Xeerol Ja.
In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Into the Traverse.”
I'm glad to see you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I wish I could share the consensus on our last drink, but Halnaruk hasn't been back.
And yet, oddly enough, my shop has had an influx of <Emphasis>other</Emphasis> Moblins clamoring for fermented aloe juice. I hardly know what to think...
Pfff... Pfffkohhh! <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Xeerol Ja!
H-Halnaruk!?
Aloe-rot juicymix is delicious! Incredibly flavortough!
One sip and Halnaruk's sluggyfeels melted away. Heavypack is now airylight!
Most days Halnaruk's parents are all achybacks and grumpywords. But after sipdrinking tasty aloe-rot, they are happy Mobbies both! Now we tell everymobbie to slurp Xeerol Ja's juicymix!
So you're to thank for all those customers! I'm glad to hear your parents are among those who benefited from our drink.
Stuffseeking is a solitary job. No one notices Halnaruk's sweatwork, and no one smiles for Halnaruk's bringfinds.
But mobbiefriends, findfellows, grumpyparents─everyone jumpskips for juicymix! Halnaruk wants to make more jumpskipping─wants to help make more juicymix!
It seems your concoction healed not only his aching back, but his aching soul as well!
Well then, now that our team is united, I say we move onto our next drink─a beverage for Hanuhanu.
I understand their diet consists mainly of reeds, which are beyond the purview of your average fruit stand.

But if we can determine how reeds benefit their health, we might craft a comparable juice. You've visited the Hanuhanu in Kozama'uka, haven't you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>? Did you learn anything about their diet while you were there?
What will you say?
Their reeds replenish their aeth─uh, energies.
Reeds seem to rejuvenate them, body and soul.
I'm sure I did at some point...
I see. Then a fruit rich in magical energies may be just what we need.
Not to worry─why don't you tell me what you do remember from Kozama'uka, and we'll figure it out together?
I see. It sounds like reeds may replenish the Hanuhanu's magical energies, so we should seek a fruit that's similarly imbued.
What about sparkleshiny Ja Tiika bananas in Yak T'el? Halnaruk has a featherfriend who says bananas are a Hanuhanu favorite!
Oh, you mean najool! That's a marvelous suggestion. Yak T'el has forests rich in magical energies, so its fruit must be as well. And if your friend vouches for it, all the better!
So long as we ensure that one glass of juice is as satisfying as a meal of reeds, our Hanuhanu customers will want for nothing.
Knowing your talents, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, I'm sure you can make that happen─you always do!
Our first creation as a real team! We'll need Ja Tiika bananas in this juice, but the rest I leave to your discretion.
We need a juicymix that is both tastyfresh and energyrich. Halnaruk is eager to see how you'll craftymake it!
This consistency looks very promising! I daresay this is just the sort of juice we need.
Goodness gracious, this juice is thick! And what an aroma! Masterful mixing, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!
This consistency looks very promising! Thank you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─this should be all we need. Let's have one of our Hanuhanu customers sample it for us.

Goodness gracious, this juice is thick! And what an aroma! Thank you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─this should be all we need. Let's have one of our Hanuhanu customers sample it for us.
So this is the Ja Tiika juice you spoke of! Full of energies, is it?
And as for its taste...
What a flavor! Rich and invigorating─why, I feel as though I've just gulped down a beakful of reeds!
I hope you'll make it a permanent addition to your menu. My friends will want a taste of this!
Powerjuice is a success! <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/> has a deft handyarm.
When thoughtmade together, our juicymixes are unstoppable!
Hear, hear! Your suggestion was invaluable for this one, Halnaruk. And for my part, it's been a delight to put my old studies to use in a tangible way.
Pfff... Kohhh... Halnaruk doesn't understand. Xeerol Ja has good thingknowings, so why not follow goaldream and be a chirurgeon?
Because I'm not good enough, that's why.
It's...well, it's a private matter I'd rather not speak of, all right?
Let's focus instead on our next juice. I've got something tricky in mind─a real challenge!
Halnaruk still doesn't understand, but will not presspry.
Xeerol Ja is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Hanuhanu Hydrator<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>!
A new quest continuing the story of Xeerol Ja Juicecraft is now available.
